name: create-tezos-smart-contract
description: Node.js toolset to write, test and deploy Tezos smart contracts

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && npm run readme && tsc
scripts.try-init: npm run build && mkdir output && rm -rf output/* && node dist/index.js --debug --folder ./output/ init test
scripts.try-start-sandbox: npm run build && node dist/index.js --debug --folder ./output/test start-sandbox
scripts.try-compile: npm run build && node dist/index.js --debug --folder ./output/test compile
scripts.try-test: npm run build && node dist/index.js --debug --folder ./output/test test
scripts.try-e2e-test: npm run build && node dist/index.js --debug --folder ./output/test e2e-test
scripts.try-deploy: npm run build && node dist/index.js --debug --folder ./output/test deploy
scripts.try-postinstall: npm run build && node dist/index.js --debug --folder ./output/test postinstall

author: uconomy <devhub@uconomy.io>
